thread.title: Ty Lawson may miss a game less than a day after asking Instagram for a 'bomb taco spot'
thread.title_full: Ty Lawson may miss a game less than a day after asking Instagram for a 'bomb taco spot'

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Ty Lawson may miss a game less than a day after asking Instagram for a 'bomb taco spot'
text:
The taco spot really was bomb, huh.
NBA players and their Instagram/Snapchat stories can be a blessing and a curse. Sometimes it’s fun to see behind the scenes action from our favorite players. Sometimes we see more than we’d like to ever see. And sometimes ... we find out exactly why Ty Lawson may miss Wednesday night’s game.
Which one of y'all made Ty go to a shady taco place in sac pic.twitter.com/O5RfOeSMeW 
— Chase Everett (@Chase_everett_) March 1, 2017 The official definition of gastroenteritis is “An intestinal infection marked by diarrhea, cramps, nausea, vomiting, and fever.” as stated by WebMD . Just in case you wondering what these tacos were all about.
Who knows where Lawson ended up but he absolutely ended up at a taco place. It was Taco Tuesday after all and who could blame him. These tacos actually look really good too despite the weird lighting. 
Here are Ty’s famous last words, “Damn boo u look sooo good.”
Ty Lawson (DNP - Tacos)
